original_text: So Moses and Aaron obeyed the Lord. They counted the Levites by their clans. There were 22,000 males who were one month old or older.
korean_text: 모세와 아론이 여호와의 명령을 따라 레위인을 각 종족대로 계수한즉 일 개월 이상 된 남자는 모두 이만 이천 명이었더라

sentences.original_text: So Moses and Aaron obeyed the Lord.
They counted the Levites by their clans.
who were one month old or older.
